thread.title: World view: temple of light, Bangladesh
thread.title_full: World view: temple of light, Bangladesh | Travel | The Guardian

author: theguardian.com
title: World view: temple of light, Bangladesh
text:
Hindu worshippers celebrate the three-day Rakher Upabas ritual at Loknath Temple in Barodi, Bangladesh. Devotees offer prayers and light earthen lamps, and fast until they burn out. The photograph has been shortlisted in the Open Colour category of the Siena International Photography Awards, a new competition which has attracted thousands of entries from more than 100 countries. Prizewinners will be announced by at a ceremony in Siena on 31 October and showcased, together with hundreds of other images, in an exhibition, Beyond the Lens, in locations across the city. Photograph: Noor Ahmed Gelal/SIPA Contest Thursday 22 October 2015 10.07 BST
